General.Name: Amper S.A
General.Description: Amper, S.A. provides technological solutions in Madrid and internationally. The company offers deployments of the new FTTH fiber optic networks and the fourth generation mobile networks. It is also involved in the provision of integrated solutions in the field of industrial services and applied energy sectors; and design, manufacture, and assembly of solutions for the control of atmospheric pollution, as well as integration of products, services, and software platforms. In addition, the company develops, integrates, and implements solutions for coordination control centers and emergency management that integrates communications infrastructure. Amper, S.A. was founded in 1956 and is based in Madrid, Spain.
